Intro.content: Today we combine our previous ideas.
We provide a personal goal and mix in some conflict to spice things up.
The test subject needs more branches for shelter. And coconuts for food.
We want to make this challenging by interposing some predators.

Coconuts collected.content: Well done. They got all the coconuts that are needed.
As for the remaining branches, we can provide them.
Now place the rest of them.

Complete - Easy.content: Quick and easy for the test subject.

Complete - Hard.content: Well that was a rough time for our test subject.

Outro.content: we instilled a feeling of separation in the test subject.
They had to fend for themselves and fight off the others.
